#AutoApiS 多功能版
name: Auto Api Test

on: 
  release:
    types: [published]
  push:
    tags:
    - 'v*'
  #  branches: 
  #    - master
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 1,5,8 * * 1-5"
  watch:
    types: [started]
   
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@master
    - name: Set up Python #安装python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v1
      with:
        python-version: 3.8
    - name: Install requests #安装requests
      run: |
        pip install requests
    - name: Read config from secrets  #读取机密
      env: 
        ID_LIST: ${{ secrets.CONFIG_ID }} # secrets_id 提供
      run: | 
        cp 1.py 2.py
        echo $ID_LIST > configid.txt
        sed -i '10 r configid.txt' 2.py
    - name: Test Api #Api调用
      run: | 
        python 2.py
